testcase.classname: Pick Mistake Without Write Textarea Note_before
testcase.name: Assign User to Contract Dona BLIBLI
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success for contract dispatcher..................................passed And Select Arrow Menu "Contract Dispatcher Admin"...........................passed And Select Menu "Management Assignment".....................................passed And Select Username "mobile.test" of Management Assignment..................passed And Check for username if already assigned to "Dona B2B"....................passed And Wait page for load......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed

testcase.classname: Pick Mistake Without Write Textarea Note_before
testcase.name: Select Menu Contract Dispatcher and Select Contract based on type contract DONA BLIBLI
testcase.system-out: Given Go to IST.............................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success for contract dispatcher..................................passed And Select Menu "Contract Dispatcher".......................................passed And Select Contract Number based on Type Contract "DONA_BLIBLI".............passed And Click button "Claim"....................................................passed And Verify Tab Mistake Matrix Base on Type Contract.........................passed And Varify the mistake detail already match with the matrix Base on Type Contract.passed And Click on Tab "KTP"......................................................passed And Checkbox General Mistake "20. KTP atau Resi - Alamat tetap pemohon pada sistem (HoS) berbeda dengan KTP".passed And Choose Dropdown mistake type "Beda RT" from mistake name "20. KTP atau Resi - Alamat tetap pemohon pada sistem (HoS) berbeda dengan KTP".passed And Type on textarea note after based on mistake name "20. KTP atau Resi - Alamat tetap pemohon pada sistem (HoS) berbeda dengan KTP" with value "Testing".passed And Click button "Save".....................................................passed And Get text from pop up "IT Supporting Tools" with text "Note-before cannot be empty".passed And Click button "OK".......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Comment "Register Mistake failed because Note-before empty".............passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
